#!/bin/bash
set -x
export PATH="/sbin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/local/bin/"
while getopts i:d:x: option
do case "$option" in
     i) ipAddress=$OPTARG;;
     d) domainFqdn=$OPTARG;;
     x) passwd=$OPTARG;;
   esac
done
user="admin"
#
#
#
pool_response_code=$(curl -sku ${user}:${passwd} -w "%{http_code}" -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" https://localhost/mgmt/tm/ltm/pool -d '{"name":"kops_ssh_pool","description":"kops_ssh_pool","monitor":"/Common/tcp ","members":[{"name":"'"$ipAddress"':22","address":"'"$ipAddress"'"}]}' -o /dev/null)
#
#
if [[ ${pool_response_code} != 200 ]]; then
echo "Failed to create the kops_ssh_pool; exiting with response code ${pool_response_code}"
exit ${pool_response_code}
else
echo "KOPS SSH Pool creation complete."
fi
#
#
vip_response_code=$(curl -sku ${user}:${passwd} -w "%{http_code}" -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" https://localhost/mgmt/tm/ltm/virtual -d '{"name":"kops_ssh_vip","destination":"/Common/"'"$ipAddress"':22","enabled":true,"ipProtocol":"tcp","mask":"any","pool":"/Common/kops_ssh_pool","source":"0.0.0.0/0","sourceAddressTranslation":{"type":"automap"},"translateAddress":"enabled","translatePort":"enabled","vlansDisabled":true,"vsIndex":3,"profiles":[{"name":"tcp"}]}' -o /dev/null)
#
#
if [[ ${vip_response_code} != 200 ]]; then
echo "Failed to create KOPS SSH VIP; exiting with response code ${vip_response_code}"
exit ${vip_response_code}
else
echo "KOPS SSH VIP creation complete."
fi
#
#
exit

#!/bin/bash -xe
#
#Update Yum and system.
yum clean all
yum -y update
#Install jq
curl -Lk https://github.com/stedolan/jq/releases/download/jq-1.5/jq-linux64 -o /opt/jq-linux64
chmod +x /opt/jq-linux64
ln -s /opt/jq-linux64 /usr/local/bin/jq
#Install kubectl
curl -Lk https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/releases/download/v1.4.9/kubernetes.tar.gz -o /opt/kubernetes.tar.gz
tar -zxvf /opt/kubernetes.tar.gz
ln -s /opt/kubernetes/platforms/linux/amd64/kubectl /usr/local/bin/kubectl
#Install kops
curl -Lk https://github.com/kubernetes/kops/releases/download/1.5.1/kops-linux-amd64 -o /opt/kops-linux-amd64
chmod +x /opt/kops-linux-amd64
mv /opt/kops-linux-amd64 /usr/local/bin/kops
curl -Lk https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py -o /opt/get-pip.py
python /opt/get-pip.py --user
export PATH=~/.local/bin:$PATH
pip install awscli --upgrade --user
#Create K8s Cluster
date
echo "Finished Installing tools and K8's Cluster"
